description: Shows statistics for existing media and transcoding operations.

panels.description: Shows the all time percent of storage saved by transcoding.

targets.queryText:
SELECT existspercent, added, tablename 
FROM StatisticsLive WHERE tablename = 'Shows'
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT existspercent, added, tablename 
FROM StatisticsLive WHERE tablename = 'Shows'

targets.queryText:
SELECT existspercent, added, tablename 
FROM StatisticsLive WHERE tablename = 'Movies'
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT existspercent, added, tablename 
FROM StatisticsLive WHERE tablename = 'Movies'

panels.title: Percent of Original Size All Time

panels.description: Total number of existing media files.

targets.queryText:
SELECT mediacount, added
From StatisticsLive WHERE tablename = 'Shows'
--ORDER BY added DESC LIMIT 1
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT mediacount, added
From StatisticsLive WHERE tablename = 'Shows'
--ORDER BY added DESC LIMIT 1

targets.queryText:
SELECT mediacount, added
From StatisticsLive WHERE tablename = 'Movies'
--ORDER BY added DESC LIMIT 1
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT mediacount, added
From StatisticsLive WHERE tablename = 'Movies'
--ORDER BY added DESC LIMIT 1

panels.title: File Count

panels.description: All Time storage saved from transcoding.

targets.queryText:
SELECT existsdifferenceMB, added
FROM StatisticsLive WHERE tablename = 'Shows'
--ORDER BY added DESC LIMIT 1
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT existsdifferenceMB, added
FROM StatisticsLive WHERE tablename = 'Shows'
--ORDER BY added DESC LIMIT 1

targets.queryText:
SELECT existsdifferenceMB, added
FROM StatisticsLive WHERE tablename = 'Movies'
--ORDER BY added DESC LIMIT 1
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT existsdifferenceMB, added
FROM StatisticsLive WHERE tablename = 'Movies'
--ORDER BY added DESC LIMIT 1

panels.title: Storage Saved All Time

panels.description: Total storage used by media files.

targets.queryText:
SELECT existssumsizeMB, added
FROM StatisticsLive WHERE tablename = 'Shows'
--ORDER BY added DESC LIMIT 1
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT existssumsizeMB, added
FROM StatisticsLive WHERE tablename = 'Shows'
--ORDER BY added DESC LIMIT 1

targets.queryText:
SELECT existssumsizeMB, added
FROM StatisticsLive WHERE tablename = 'Movies'
ORDER BY added DESC LIMIT 1
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT existssumsizeMB, added
FROM StatisticsLive WHERE tablename = 'Movies'
ORDER BY added DESC LIMIT 1

panels.title: Total Storage Usage

panels.description: Shows the growth in storage usage over time. Useful in predicting when additional storage will be required.

targets.queryText:
SELECT growth30daysMB, growth90daysMB, growth180daysMB, growth365daysMB, added
FROM Statistics WHERE tablename = 'Shows'
ORDER BY added DESC LIMIT 365
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT growth30daysMB, growth90daysMB, growth180daysMB, growth365daysMB, added
FROM Statistics WHERE tablename = 'Shows'
ORDER BY added DESC LIMIT 365

panels.title: Increased Disk usage Shows

panels.description: Shows the growth in storage usage over time. Useful in predicting when additional storage will be required.

targets.queryText:
SELECT growth30daysMB, growth90daysMB, growth180daysMB, growth365daysMB, added
FROM Statistics WHERE tablename = 'Movies'
ORDER BY added DESC LIMIT 365
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT growth30daysMB, growth90daysMB, growth180daysMB, growth365daysMB, added
FROM Statistics WHERE tablename = 'Movies'
ORDER BY added DESC LIMIT 365

panels.title: Increased Disk usage Movies

panels.description: Graph helps to illustrate how changes in the media sources or transcoding parameters result in changes to file size over time.

targets.queryText:
SELECT (100 / sum(oldsizeMB)) * sum(newsizeMB)
FROM Shows
WHERE fileexists = 'true'
  And added > DATETIME('now', '-30 day')
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT (100 / sum(oldsizeMB)) * sum(newsizeMB)
FROM Shows
WHERE fileexists = 'true'
  And added > DATETIME('now', '-30 day')

targets.queryText:
SELECT (100 / sum(oldsizeMB)) * sum(newsizeMB)
FROM Shows
WHERE fileexists = 'true'
  And added > DATETIME('now', '-90 day')
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT (100 / sum(oldsizeMB)) * sum(newsizeMB)
FROM Shows
WHERE fileexists = 'true'
  And added > DATETIME('now', '-90 day')

targets.queryText:
SELECT (100 / sum(oldsizeMB)) * sum(newsizeMB)
FROM Shows
WHERE fileexists = 'true'
  And added > DATETIME('now', '-180 day')
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT (100 / sum(oldsizeMB)) * sum(newsizeMB)
FROM Shows
WHERE fileexists = 'true'
  And added > DATETIME('now', '-180 day')

targets.queryText:
SELECT (100 / sum(oldsizeMB)) * sum(newsizeMB)
FROM Shows
WHERE fileexists = 'true'
  And added > DATETIME('now', '-365 day')
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT (100 / sum(oldsizeMB)) * sum(newsizeMB)
FROM Shows
WHERE fileexists = 'true'
  And added > DATETIME('now', '-365 day')

panels.title: Movies Percent of Original Size over Time

panels.description: Simply shows the number of added media files in a given time period.
